SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

ca.keefer.sanemethod.Interface
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Interface.Text
Direct Known Subclasses:
Option
public class Text
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines a Text object, with the following properties: name String of the object name derived from xml or direct input font The font to use to print this Text object colour The colour to print the string in text The string to print boxed boolean determining whether to draw a text box around the string or not resString the parsed string to print textTex Texture for text box position short determining vertical screen position x float x position y float y position prepared whether this text object is ready to drawn or not

Version:
1.5
Author:
Christopher Keefer
